core: Developed hardware-in-the-loop test platform for vision-based lunar navigation

technical_ic.medium: Developed test platform for vision-based lunar navigation
technical_ic.detailed: Engineered hardware-in-the-loop simulation platform for evaluating vision-based navigation algorithms and camera systems for lunar missions

systems_engineer.medium: Designed and integrated HWIL platform for space systems
systems_engineer.detailed: Led system integration of optical, mechanical, and software components for lunar navigation validation platform in GPS-denied environments

project_lead.medium: Managed accelerated delivery of navigation test system
project_lead.detailed: Led rapid development and delivery of critical navigation test platform, coordinating multiple subsystems while meeting accelerated timeline

research.medium: Developed novel approach to lunar navigation validation
research.detailed: Created innovative test methodology for validating vision-based navigation in GPS-denied lunar environments
